p: In 2016 almost all the age group were found to be equally infected by dengue except age group of upto 10 years. For the year 2017 highest positive cases were observed in the age groups of 21–30 followed by upto 10 age groups and least was seen in the case of 41–50 age groups. In the year 2018 the highest positive cases were observed in the age group of 11–20 years followed by 21–30 age groups while least was seen in the age group of 31–40 and 41–50. ( Table 4 & Fig. 2).
